MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Lime Close and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.28AM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 11 AM and we expect the power to be restored by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.03AM on 4TH April 2021
